You can participate as either a mentee or mentor:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":54621,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c83fe82c-bf95-48e2-b9cf-319e7f1e6a23/8_GE.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c83fe82c-bf95-48e2-b9cf-319e7f1e6a23/8_GE.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8_GE.PNG\",\"name\":\"8_GE.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c83fe82c-bf95-48e2-b9cf-319e7f1e6a23\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":751,\"height\":190},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We offer several types of mentoring — local and global.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global mentoring in our practice takes place several times a year. We've already had several successful launches of React.js, React Native, Node.js, and Angular programs. The global mentoring program is constantly updated, lectures and assignments are updated in accordance with the current state of technology. Lectures are read by experienced developers who have sufficient experience with technology, can answer almost any question or suggest where the answer can be found. Video recordings of lectures are stored on the video portal, and at any time you can revise the desired lecture or watch the recording of the lecture from other programs.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regarding the launches of new programs\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — keep an eye on our email newsletter. This is always reported.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regarding participation in local or global mentoring, please contact your resource manager or HR – they will tell you about the conditions of participation, advice on programs, and together you’ll be able to choose the most suitable program, select the necessary modules, and plan the schedule.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can learn more about mentoring for Candidates \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/Candidate\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Of course, you can take part in committees as an expert or as a head. If your level is L3 or higher, then you can talk to your resource manager and get the opportunity to take part in the global assessment. This is a unique opportunity to communicate with colleagues from other locations and learn about their experiences.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your level is still L2, don't worry, you can still participate in assessment sessions, but in local ones; contact your resource manager or HR, they will guide you.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EUXDCC/Sandbox+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandbox projects\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EUXDCC/Sandbox+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We try to be creative when solving various problems. We have this cool initiative where we start our own projects and then use them to bring various benefits to the department and the world. Sometimes it's even just for fun and a way to make life more interesting :)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But, among other things, the main idea of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EUXDCC/Sandbox+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandbox projects \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is the opportunity to gain experience, to try things that are difficult to find on your current project.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have some ideas or just want to participate – you can join by informing your resource manager or visit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Sandboxes\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandboxes page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".
